input.sentences: the crowd gathered to watch the jousting match .
everyone was excited for the event to begin .
then there was a girl with a giant wrench and megaphone .
there were women in biker jackets .
after that the jousting match had begun .
output.sentences: It was their 10 year Highschool reunion and many of these alumni still dressed like edgy teens even into their late 20s.
Everyone was there outside the gas station they always used to hang at, it was good to see Trevor even though he was still on parole.
Maxine was still an avid horder and managed to score a large wrench, stuffed animal and a megaphone on her way to the meeting, she's so good at what she does.
Anastasia was still making her own biker vests but alas, the clothing line never took off on Etsy.
By the end of the day many friends enjoyed each other and past rivals settled old grudges with the traditional BMX Joust that dated back to the towns founding in 1922.
